website_summaries.verdict: Don't let the low price or small size fool you, because the MyMini Griddle is capable of making eggs, pancakes, sandwiches, and more.
pros: Simple, inexpensive griddle that doesn't take up a lot of counter or storage space
Round designed works well for cooking eggs and pancakes
Fits English muffins nicely for classic breakfast sandwiches
Nonstick cook plates are easy to wipe clean
cons: Plates are fixed, but not difficult to clean
Doesn't fit a large portion of food at once

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this egg maker to replace my old one that wore out. I have to say this one isn't that good. It takes forever to get an egg done in this and seems like it only heats on the bottom plate. My old egg maker cooked much faster AND cooked both sides. Disappointed, but I do like the color and that's about it. UPDATE: ok so now after maybe 2 months the egg maker completely crapped out. No heat, nothing. My advice; buy a different brand because these aren't very good.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: So cute!
customer_reviews.text: This little cooking machine is so adorable! I almost didn't want to use it! haha It worked quite well! I purchased this to make "chaffles" I know this isn't the mini waffle maker, but I wanted to try it for more of a bun like substitute. I love it! Easy to use, and easy to clean and for obvious reasons, easy to store!
customer_reviews.author: Keri Ann

customer_reviews.title: Maybe I got a bad one?
customer_reviews.text: It takes for-ev-er to cook a single pancake. I thought I'd try to cook myself a quick breakfast for my first go. Here I am, 20 min later, and I finally just took #3 off and transferred it to my waffle maker. #1 & #2 never seemed to fully cook. I followed all the instructions - allowed to fully preheat, kept lid closed between batches, etc. VERY disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Size for Making Buns
customer_reviews.text: I like most everything about this griddle - from the size to the ease of cleaning. However, the bottom browns nicely but the top does not. You have to flip your pancake in order for it to be uniform. I do think that might be an advantage though if you were fixing an egg. I use mine for making "buns" in place of traditional bread and the size is great.
customer_reviews.author: Mom2Lilli

customer_reviews.title: Great for a quick snack!
customer_reviews.text: Great for kids that want to learn how to cook. My 10yr makes fried eggs, cheesy toast (open grilled cheese) quesadillas, mini burgers, pancakes. He likes that he can make himself something and he feels independent. Great for a quick snack!
customer_reviews.author: Ivy-Jo

customer_reviews.title: Works fast and nice size for 1 serving
customer_reviews.text: This works fast to give you a quick one person meal. I use for diet pancakes and egg whites. It looks like it won’t fit but doesn’t overflow. Easy to clean too
customer_reviews.author: Elaine

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little product. I actually use it to make egg sandwiches. It's the perfect size for it. And it wipes up really easy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dont expect much from this
customer_reviews.text: Not real happy with this. Price is nice but this thing works great sometimes and cooks fast then other times it cooks soooooo slow. It clearly isn't getting hot enough. Most of the time leaves eggs runny in the middle. This thing needs a small temp control. I dont recommend this product, I'm sure there is way better on the market.
customer_reviews.author: Jon Rowe

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money. Don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: Pancakes don’t cook all the way through on the other side. You must flip the pancake in order to get the same result on the other side. ABSOLUTELY TAKES FOREVER!!!! By the time I finished 5 I had to reheat them all back up. Took over 30 min to cook 4 pancakes. Waste of money, I will be returning today.... oh I just got it today lol 🤣 -1 stars ⭐️
customer_reviews.author: john mason

customer_reviews.title: For kids only
customer_reviews.text: Took too long and not good for eggs, you can’t push the top down without the yolk having a patch from the other top... so your yolk with have a white patch
customer_reviews.author: sabrina

customer_reviews.title: Garbage to small
customer_reviews.text: If I could give it a zero I would ! Unfortunately it’s so small I can’t cook on it It went back the same day Save ur money
customer_reviews.author: jonathan

customer_reviews.title: Not a good omelette maker
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this just to make an omlette with sausage, ham, green onions, green peppers. After adding an egg and a very few omelette ingredients the egg starts to run over the sides. Just the egg basically fills the griddle. If you're looking for an omelette maker, I suggest something larger.
customer_reviews.author: JR

customer_reviews.title: awesome for cookies
customer_reviews.text: this is so cute but it is very small! it takes a bit of time to cook something but i like it for my dorm. i made a cookie out of raw cookie dough and it worked great
customer_reviews.author: Sophia

customer_reviews.title: great for travel
customer_reviews.text: What a wonderful appliance! So easy to use. Exactly what I wanted. Perfect 1 egg omelet
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Barnhill

customer_reviews.title: Can't do cookies and a pain to clean up
customer_reviews.text: If you want to make cookies then get a oven because the cookie dough has to be a ball or very doughie. Pancakes are ok and i don't think the eggs are going to work. And if you mess of its a pain in the butt to clean up.
customer_reviews.author: deanna

customer_reviews.title: Cute.
customer_reviews.text: Great idea for a quick breakfast But I got burned on it. BE CAREFUL.
customer_reviews.author: Shirley R Greene

customer_reviews.title: It is mini,but it works great 👍🏻
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my RV.. i’ve made eggs pancakes and warmed up muffins and sandwich bagels I love it 👍🏻
customer_reviews.author: Mary M.

customer_reviews.title: Not bad for the price
customer_reviews.text: Only bought it bc a competing version, of which I have purchased a few over the last few years, was out of stock. While it works fine, it takes much longer to cook eggs or batter when comparing it to the other.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Very very small
customer_reviews.text: This item is very small Measure before you order. My review and stars are based solely on the size
customer_reviews.author: Glinda Penney

customer_reviews.title: My daughter loves it
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 10 yr old who likes to make her own pancakes. I figured it would be safer then the stove. She loves it!
customer_reviews.author: silvia garcia

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't Cook Through
customer_reviews.text: The item doesn't cook all the way through on both sides. Actually had to flip over the pancake to get it to cook on the other side. The pancakes still were mushy inside. Not 100% satisfied, but I don't feel like returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Joy Gilbreath

customer_reviews.title: A kitchen necessity
customer_reviews.text: Love this little jewel a must for pancakes ~ and the perfect healthy fried egg for one ☺
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Less on oil or frying
customer_reviews.text: I love to use it really portable carry on to work.
customer_reviews.author: mele

customer_reviews.title: Overall it’s ok
customer_reviews.text: It needs to be hotter and it takes longer to cook
customer_reviews.author: Erica  Arbuckle

customer_reviews.title: Must buy
customer_reviews.text: I Love how easy it is to use and clean up, and it makes the best egg sandwiches
customer_reviews.author: Sara H.

customer_reviews.title: It works well but the top part needs to be better connected
customer_reviews.text: The top part is loose and falls in and does not open and stay open for me to get my pancake out.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not a fan of this product 🥺
customer_reviews.text: I always buy Dash products. This time I decided to but this one because I didn’t want more than 2 days to get it. I got to say Im not in love with it. I do like the cooking surface is a tiny bit bigger than Dash but everything sticks even using avocado oil spray. With Dash with or without avocado oil nothing sticks to the surface. Cooking time also takes longer. Im going to order a Dash again 🥺
customer_reviews.author: Memyelfnannette

customer_reviews.title: Tiny yet terrific
customer_reviews.text: It is smaller than a man's hand, yet, cooks eggs perfectly in a few minutes. Super easy to clean & heats up fast & gets very hot. Don't let the size fool you, food tastes clean & fresh. Worth the purchase, if you are single & need a fast & easy breakfast without the microwave radiation.
customer_reviews.author: Michael WOLFMAN

customer_reviews.title: By reviews there’s “One in 10 bad”
customer_reviews.text: It doesn’t cook like some of the reviews that I’ve read. Must be one in 10 that’s bad. It’s 2 weeks past return status and of no use. Good for nothing. Money spent unwisely.
customer_reviews.author: Larry McPherson

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I use this every couple of days. So far it has held up well. I bought my sister one too. The longer you leave it one, the more over hard the eggs get.
customer_reviews.author: jewelry29

customer_reviews.title: To small
customer_reviews.text: To small...tried to make a egg mcmuffin and it wouldn't fit just barely could close the lid. Cheese hardly melted and you can't control the temp. Not for me.
customer_reviews.author: SHINBONE69

customer_reviews.title: Happy with purchase
customer_reviews.text: This was a good purchase. I will probably always keep one of these on my counter. It's mini, and perfect size for pancakes.
customer_reviews.author: Kelley Brooks

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Got it for my Grandson and he loves it. He makes his little pancakes in the morning and his Mom loves it for eggs.
customer_reviews.author: Fran Graczyk

customer_reviews.title: Happy with My Mini Grill
customer_reviews.text: I like the size for servings for one. Easy to use, Easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: happyshopper60

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: worked awesome,Chaffles in all sorts of ways in the making :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great item
customer_reviews.text: Easy , fun and fast way to make many types of waffles
customer_reviews.author: JR

customer_reviews.title: Perfect mini pancakes
customer_reviews.text: Makes perfect mini pancakes every time. I sprayed with oil but you can use without oil as well.
customer_reviews.author: Dana Kaufman

product_meta.title: Nostalgia MGD5OR MyMini Personal Electric Griddle, Eggs, Omelets, Pancakes Breakfast Sandwiches, Quesadillas, Cookies, Orange
product_meta.description: Quickly make fried eggs, pancakes, omelets, breakfast sandwiches, cookies and more with the my mini personal electric griddle! Cooking is as simple as 1-2-3 - all you have to do is plug in the unit, wait a couple of minutes for it to preheat and then you can start cooking! It's small and lightweight so it won't create cluster on your kitchen counter - making it perfect for small kitchens, apartments, dorms and campers/RVs. This is the perfect gift for any occasion!
feature_bullets: ON THE GO MEALS: quick and healthier WAY TO cook eggs, omelets, pancakes, hashbrowns, breakfast sandwiches, quesadillas, pizza, cookies and more - perfect for breakfast, lunch, dinner and dessert!
EASY TO USE: Simply plug it in, wait 1-3 minutes until preheated and when the indicator light shuts off you can begin cooking!
COMPACT & LIGHTWEIGHT: Its small size makes it the perfect fit for any kitchen, apartment, office, dorm and camper/RV
DUAL-SIDED COOKING SURFACE: Each cooking surface is 5-inches wide - providing quick, efficient and consistent results. The nonstick surface easily wipes clean
COOL-TOUCH HANDLES: Cool-touch handle allows you to keep your hands safe when opening and closing lid
INDICATOR LIGHTS: The power and preheat indicator light will let you know when it's time to start cooking
GIFT-GIVING: Perfect gift for weddings, birthdays, holidays, college living and more!

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars338 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
